about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our Corporate Identity and Values
about.pageDescription: We build your dreams with modern architectural understanding and customer satisfaction at the forefront.
about.description: With over 20 years of experience, we provide reliable and quality construction services.
about.companyDesc: Korkmaz EPA Construction has been serving the construction sector for over two decades. With our experienced team and innovative approach, we deliver quality projects.
about.paragraph1: With our approach prioritizing modern architectural understanding, sustainable building technologies, and customer satisfaction, we build your living spaces beyond your dreams. We offer quality, reliability, durability, and aesthetic values together in every project.
about.paragraph2: With our expert staff in the field, we provide services in a wide range from residential projects to commercial buildings, from urban renewal to restoration works.
about.missionText: To provide modern, safe and sustainable construction solutions that meet the needs of our clients.
about.visionText: To be a leading construction company recognized for quality, reliability and innovation.
